CustomField.description: IF( ISBLANK(Owner:User.Contact.Account.Customer_Address_Street__c), NULL, Owner:User.Contact.Account.Customer_Address_Street__c&", ") & IF( ISBLANK(Owner:User.Contact.Account.Customer_Address_City__c), NULL, Owner:User.Contact.Account.Customer_Address_City__c &", ") & IF( TEXT(Owner:User.Contact.Account.Customer_Address_County__c)="", NULL, TEXT(Owner:User.Contact.Account.Customer_Address_County__c) &", ") & IF( ISBLANK(Owner:User.Contact.Account.Customer_Address_Street__c), NULL, Owner:User.Contact.Account.Customer_Address_Postcode__c &", ") & IF( TEXT(Owner:User.Contact.Account.Customer_Address_Country__c)="", NULL, TEXT(Owner:User.Contact.Account.Customer_Address_Country__c))
CustomField.label: Distributor address
